SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(charge) FROM bill NATURAL JOIN `order` NATURAL JOIN customer WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) <= date(order_create_time) GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(charge) >= ALL ( SELECT SUM(charge) FROM bill NATURAL JOIN `order` WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) <= date(order_create_time) GROUP BY customer_id ) ORDER BY SUM(charge) DESC;
